embed.description: **Soulbound Skulls** is an item players may accumulate over a run. This card is exclusive to the **Shademancers Tribe**

fields.name: Effects
fields.value: Add **Soulbound** to an ally. Add **Soulbound** to a random enemy

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: This can also apply to the boss or to your leader!

embed.title: Soulbound Skulls
